pages.text: The healing of passive creatures and players is increased while in they remain in the ritual range.$(br2)Indeed, those passive creatures healed by the ritual are healed for significantly more health, and also more frequently, than players.$(br2)$(info) Hostile creatures are unaffected by the ritual.
$(standing_stones) As a $(l:rituals/tiers)$(bold)tier I$() ritual, $(l:rituals/ritual_healing_aura#multiblock)a single runed pillar is required to begin$(). Please see later pages of this entry.
A single $(l:rituals/standing_stone)runed pillar$() of birch is required.

pages.title: Ritual Specifics
pages.text: $(bold)Duration:$() The ritual lasts $(ritual:healing_aura/SECONDS/duration) seconds.$(br2)$(bold)Size:$() The ritual will search targets for within an area of $(ritual:healing_aura/radius_x) and $(ritual:healing_aura/radius_z) blocks horizontally, and by $(ritual:healing_aura/radius_y) blocks vertically.$(br2)$(bold)Player Healing$(): Players are healed every $(ritual:healing_aura/SECONDS/interval) seconds for $(ritual:healing_aura/HEART/player_amount) hearts.$(br2)$(bold)Passive Healing$(): Passive creatures are healed every $(ritual:healing_aura/SECONDS/passive_interval) seconds for $(ritual:healing_aura/HEART/amount) hearts.
